text: Games were released on the last and third to last Tuesdays of every month. If that day was a public holiday, it was moved to Wednesday. Nintendo of Korea announced games a week before release. The last game was released in April 2009. Nintendo ended the Wii Shop Channel on January 31, 2019. Wii Points could not be bought from March 26, 2018. ==Available titles== This is a list of all 40 Virtual Console games released for the Wii in South Korea, sorted by system and release date. ===Nintendo Entertainment System=== 23 games were available. Title Publisher Release date Language Donkey Kong Nintendo English Kekkyoku Nankyoku Daibouken Konami Japanese Kirby's Adventure Nintendo English Super Mario Bros. Nintendo Japanese Nekketsu Kōkō Dodgeball Bu: Soccer Hen Windysoft Japanese Adventures of Lolo HAL Laboratory English Joy Mech Fight Nintendo Japanese The Legend of Zelda Nintendo English ===Super Nintendo Entertainment System=== 13 games were available. Title Publisher Release date Language Contra III: The Alien Wars Konami English Cybernator Hudson Soft English Gradius III Konami English Super Mario World Nintendo English Super Metroid Nintendo Japanese/ English Donkey Kong Country Nintendo English The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past Nintendo English F-Zero Nintendo English Super R-Type Irem English Panel de Pon Nintendo Japanese Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest Nintendo English R-Type III: The Third Lightning Irem Japanese Kirby's Dream Course Nintendo English ===Nintendo 64=== 4 games were available.
